languages.text: {n}Вероятно, дознаватель ван Калокс поведал Кассии о Темном городе во время одного из варп-перелетов. Эти двое с первого дня предпочитали прочим компанию друг друга.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вероятно, дознаватель ван Калокс поведал Кассии о Темном Городе во время одного из варп-перелетов. Эти двое с первого дня предпочитали прочим компанию друг друга.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Interrogator van Calox must have told Cassia about the Dark City during one of your warp voyages. Since day one, those two have preferred each other's company to anyone else's.{/n}

languages.text: {n}卡西娅之所以这么了解黑暗之城的情况，肯定是审讯官冯·卡洛克斯某次亚空间航行期间告诉她的。比起其他人，这两个人更喜欢彼此的陪伴，从一开始就是这个样子。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interrogator van Calox must have told Cassia about the Dark City during one of your warp voyages. Since day one, those two have preferred each other's company to anyone else's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅之所以这么了解黑暗之城的情况，肯定是审讯官冯·卡洛克斯某次亚空间航行期间告诉她的。比起其他人，这两个人更喜欢彼此的陪伴，从一开始就是这个样子。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}El Interrogador van Calox debe haberle hablado a Cassia sobre la Ciudad Siniestra durante uno de vuestros viajes por la disformidad. Desde el primer día, esos dos han preferido su mutua compañía a la de cualquier otro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interrogator van Calox must have told Cassia about the Dark City during one of your warp voyages. Since day one, those two have preferred each other's company to anyone else's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Interrogador van Calox debe haberle hablado a Cassia sobre la Ciudad Siniestra durante uno de vuestros viajes por la disformidad. Desde el primer día, esos dos han preferido su mutua compañía a la de cualquier otro.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックスは、歪みの航行中にカシアに仄暗き都のことを話したに違いない。あの2人は初日から、他の誰よりも互いに話すことを好んでいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interrogator van Calox must have told Cassia about the Dark City during one of your warp voyages. Since day one, those two have preferred each other's company to anyone else's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイター・ヴァン・カロックスは、歪みの航行中にカシアに仄暗き都のことを話したに違いない。あの2人は初日から、他の誰よりも互いに話すことを好んでいた。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Interrogator van Calox muss Cassia auf einer Eurer Warp-Reisen von der Dunklen Stadt berichtet haben. Diese beiden sind seit dem ersten Tag nur miteinander zu sehen, selten mit jemand anderem.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interrogator van Calox must have told Cassia about the Dark City during one of your warp voyages. Since day one, those two have preferred each other's company to anyone else's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Interrogator van Calox muss Cassia auf einer Eurer Warp-Reisen von der Dunklen Stadt berichtet haben. Diese beiden sind seit dem ersten Tag nur miteinander zu sehen, selten mit jemand anderem.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur van Calox a dû parler de la Cité Crépusculaire à Cassia au cours de l'un de vos voyages dans le Warp. Après tout, ces deux-là semblent s'apprécier. Plus, en tout cas, qu'ils apprécient les autres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interrogator van Calox must have told Cassia about the Dark City during one of your warp voyages. Since day one, those two have preferred each other's company to anyone else's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur van Calox a dû parler de la Cité Crépusculaire à Cassia au cours de l'un de vos voyages dans le Warp. Après tout, ces deux-là semblent s'apprécier. Plus, en tout cas, qu'ils apprécient les autres.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu van Calox, Öteboyut seyahatlerinizden biri sırasında Cassia'ya Kara Şehir'i anlatmış olmalı. Cassia ve van Calox, daha ilk günden başkalarıyla değil de birbirleriyle sohbet etmeyi yeğliyordu.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Interrogator van Calox must have told Cassia about the Dark City during one of your warp voyages. Since day one, those two have preferred each other's company to anyone else's.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu van Calox, Öteboyut seyahatlerinizden biri sırasında Cassia'ya Kara Şehri anlatmış olmalı. Cassia ve van Calox, daha ilk günden başkalarıyla değil de birbirleriyle sohbet etmeyi yeğliyordu.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
